user.title: Smart Climate Control Setup
user.description: Configure your Smart Climate Control integration

data_description.climate_entity: Select the climate entity you want to control
data_description.room_sensor: Select the temperature sensor for the room
data_description.outdoor_sensor: Select an outdoor temperature sensor for better predictions
data_description.power_sensor: Select a power sensor to detect when the AC is running
data_description.max_offset: Maximum temperature offset to apply (safety limit)
data_description.min_temperature: Minimum temperature the system can set
data_description.max_temperature: Maximum temperature the system can set
data_description.update_interval: How often to update the offset calculation
data_description.ml_enabled: Enable machine learning for better offset predictions
data_description.thermal_efficiency_enabled: Enable advanced thermal efficiency optimization (experimental feature)
data_description.preference_level: Balance between comfort and energy savings
data_description.shadow_mode: Enable to observe thermal patterns without controlling the AC
data_description.recovery_duration_minutes: Recovery time after mode changes (30-60 minutes)
data_description.calibration_idle_minutes: Minutes AC must be idle for opportunistic calibration (15-120)
data_description.calibration_drift_threshold: Maximum temperature drift for calibration stability (0.05-0.5°C)

error.no_temperature_sensors: No temperature sensors found in your Home Assistant

init.title: Smart Climate Control Options
init.description: Configure advanced settings for your Smart Climate Control

data_description.thermal_efficiency_enabled: Enable advanced thermal efficiency optimization for energy savings
data_description.preference_level: Choose your balance between comfort and energy savings
data_description.shadow_mode: Enable to monitor thermal patterns without controlling the AC
data_description.priming_duration_hours: Duration for initial thermal learning (24-48 hours recommended)
data_description.recovery_duration_minutes: Time to recover after mode changes (30-60 minutes)
data_description.probe_drift_limit: Maximum temperature drift during active learning (1.0-3.0°C)
data_description.calibration_idle_minutes: Minutes AC must be idle before opportunistic calibration triggers (15-120)
data_description.calibration_drift_threshold: Maximum temperature drift to consider conditions stable for calibration (0.05-0.5°C)
